actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives to save the Social Security System.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that steps be taken to place the Social Security System on a sound financial footing and insure that those relying on Social Security not be adversely affected.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives to save the Social Security System.
